summary.para: Creates a shader-trace interface for a shader-trace information object.

param.name: pShader
param.para: A pointer to the interface of the shader to create the shader-trace interface for. For example, pShader can be an instance of , , and so on.

param.name: pTraceDesc
param.para: A pointer to a structure that describes the shader-trace object to create. This parameter cannot be NULL.

param.name: ppShaderTrace
param.para: A pointer to a variable that receives a pointer to the interface for the shader-trace object that CreateShaderTrace creates.

item.description: S_OK if the method created the shader-trace information object.
E_FAIL if the reference device, which supports tracing, is not being used.
E_OUTOFMEMORY if memory is unavailable to complete the operation.
E_INVALIDARG if any parameter is NULL or invalid.
Possibly other error codes that are described in Direct3D 11 Return Codes.

remarks.para: This API requires the Windows Software Development Kit (SDK) for Windows 8.

summary.para: An ID3D11ShaderTraceFactory interface implements a method for generating shader trace information objects.

remarks.para: These APIs require the Windows Software Development Kit (SDK) for Windows 8.
To retrieve an instance of ID3D11ShaderTraceFactory, call on a that you created with .
